name: Sturdy Copper Mining Pick
description: Used to mine Copper Ore.

name: Sturdy Mithril Logging Axe
description: Used to chop down Red Oak Saplings, Cypress Saplings, Baoba Saplings, and all other lesser saplings.

name: Sturdy Steel Harvesting Sickle
description: Used to gather Zucchini, Kale, Root Vegetables, Varied Mushrooms, Young Herbs, Grapes, Cabbage, and all other lesser edible plants.

name: Sturdy Iron Logging Axe
description: Used to chop down Gummo Saplings, Mimosa Saplings, Snow Cherry Saplings, and all other lesser saplings.

name: Sturdy Darksteel Harvesting Sickle
description: Used to gather Blackberries, Variegated Taproots, Scallions, Portobello Mushrooms, Mature Herbs, Sugar Pumpkins, Cauliflower, and all other lesser edible plants. Can also harvest Coral.

name: Sturdy Orichalcum Harvesting Sickle
description: Used to gather all plants.

name: Sturdy Iron Harvesting Sickle
description: Used to gather Taproots, Spinach, Strawberries, Herb Sprouts, and all other lesser edible plants. Can also crack open Clams.

name: Sturdy Steel Mining Pick
description: Used to mine Gold Ore, and all other lesser metals.

name: Sturdy Mithril Mining Pick
description: Used to mine Mithril Ore, and all other lesser metals.

name: Sturdy Steel Logging Axe
description: Used to chop down Tukawa Saplings, Fir Saplings, and all other lesser saplings.

name: Sturdy Orichalcum Logging Axe
description: Used to chop down all saplings.

name: Sturdy Copper Logging Axe
description: Used to chop down Aspen Saplings, Kertch Saplings, and Ekku Saplings.

name: Sturdy Mithril Harvesting Sickle
description: Used to gather Asparagus, Cayenne Peppers, Leeks, Winter Root Vegetables, Verdant Herbs, Raspberries, Butternut Squash, Artichokes, and all other lesser edible plants.

name: Sturdy Iron Mining Pick
description: Used to mine Iron Ore, Silver Ore, and all other lesser metals.

name: Sturdy Orichalcum Mining Pick
description: Used to mine all metals.

name: Sturdy Darksteel Logging Axe
description: Used to chop down Banyan Saplings, Pine Saplings, Inglewood Saplings, and all other lesser saplings.

name: Sturdy Copper Harvesting Sickle
description: Used to gather Blueberries, Button Mushrooms, Onions, Carrots, Herb Seedlings, Potatoes, and Lettuce.

name: Sturdy Darksteel Mining Pick
description: Used to mine Platinum Ore, and all other lesser metals.
